After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to resolve warranty claims.
After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.FORMULA: Total Time to Resolve Warranty Claims / Number of Warranty Claims

After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.EXPLANATION: Measures the percentage of warranty claims that are rejected.
After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.FORMULA: (Number of Warranty Claims Rejected / Total Number of Warranty Claims) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to complete repairs.
After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.FORMULA: Total Time Spent on Repairs / Number of Repairs

After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.KPIS: Percentage of repairs covered under warranty
After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.EXPLANATION: Measures the proportion of repairs that are covered under warranty.
After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.FORMULA: (Number of Repairs Covered Under Warranty / Total Number of Repairs) * 100

After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.EXPLANATION: Measures customers' satisfaction with warranty services.
After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Rating on Warranty Service

After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.KPIS: Warranty cost as a percentage of revenue
After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.EXPLANATION: Measures the cost of warranty claims relative to revenue.
The total number of repairs that were repeated for the same issue.
Measures the percentage of warranty claims that are approved.
After Sales+Customer Service+Warranty an.FORMULA: (Number of Approved Warranty Claims / Total Number of Warranty Claims) * 100
